languages.text: "Дарить и принимать смерть. И не страшиться поворотов судьбы. Тот, кто боится смерти, уже мертв душой, ждет конца и боится принять неизбежное. Жизнь в страхе — постыдна. Посвятить себя смерти без сожалений — вот истинная стезя".

"To give and receive death. And to fear no twist or turn of fate. One who is afraid of death is already dead in their soul, waiting for the end, afraid to accept the inevitable. A life of fear is disgraceful. The true service is in dedicating oneself to death with no regrets."
languages.original_text: "Дарить и принимать смерть. И не страшиться поворотов судьбы. Тот, кто боится смерти, уже мертв душой, ждет конца и боится принять неизбежное. Жизнь в страхе — постыдна. Посвятить себя смерти без сожалений — вот истинная стезя".

traits.locale_text: "To give and receive death. And to fear no twist or turn of fate. One who is afraid of death is already dead in their soul: waiting for the end, afraid to accept the inevitable. A life of fear is disgraceful. The true path is in dedicating oneself to death with no regrets."

"To give and receive death. And to fear no twist or turn of fate. One who is afraid of death is already dead in their soul: waiting for the end, afraid to accept the inevitable. A life of fear is disgraceful. The true path is in dedicating oneself to death with no regrets."

"To give and receive death. And to fear no twist or turn of fate. One who is afraid of death is already dead in their soul, waiting for the end, afraid to accept the inevitable. A life of fear is disgraceful. The true service is in dedicating oneself to death with no regrets."

languages.text: "Den Tod zu geben und zu empfangen. Und keine Wendung oder Kapriole des Schicksals zu fürchten. Wer den Tod fürchtet, der ist seelisch bereits tot, wartet auf das Ende, hat Angst, das Unvermeidliche zu akzeptieren. Ein Leben voller Angst ist schändlich. Der wahre Dienst liegt darin, sich dem Tod ohne Reue zu verschreiben."
languages.original_text: "To give and receive death. And to fear no twist or turn of fate. One who is afraid of death is already dead in their soul, waiting for the end, afraid to accept the inevitable. A life of fear is disgraceful. The true service is in dedicating oneself to death with no regrets."

traits.locale_text: "Den Tod zu geben und zu empfangen. Und keine Wendung oder Kapriole des Schicksals zu fürchten. Wer den Tod fürchtet, der ist seelisch bereits tot, wartet auf das Ende, hat Angst, das Unvermeidliche zu akzeptieren. Ein Leben voller Angst ist schändlich. Der wahre Pfad liegt darin, sich dem Tod ohne Reue zu verschreiben."

languages.text: «Dar y recibir la muerte. Y no temer ningún giro inesperado del destino. Quien teme la muerte ya está muerto por dentro, esperando el final, temeroso de aceptar lo inevitable. Una vida de miedo es deshonrosa. El verdadero servicio está en la dedicación a la muerte sin ningún arrepentimiento».
languages.original_text: "To give and receive death. And to fear no twist or turn of fate. One who is afraid of death is already dead in their soul, waiting for the end, afraid to accept the inevitable. A life of fear is disgraceful. The true service is in dedicating oneself to death with no regrets."

traits.locale_text: «Dar y recibir la muerte. Y no temer ningún giro inesperado del destino. Quien teme la muerte ya está muerto por dentro, esperando el final, temeroso de aceptar lo inevitable. Una vida de miedo es deshonrosa. El verdadero camino está en la dedicación a la muerte sin ningún arrepentimiento».

languages.text: 「死を与え、受け取ること。運命の紆余曲折を恐れないこと。死を恐れる者は、魂の中で既に死んでいる。終わりを待ち、避けられぬことを受け入れることを恐れているのだ。恐怖の人生は不名誉なことだ。真の奉仕とは後悔することなく死へと身を捧げることなのだ」
languages.original_text: "To give and receive death. And to fear no twist or turn of fate. One who is afraid of death is already dead in their soul, waiting for the end, afraid to accept the inevitable. A life of fear is disgraceful. The true service is in dedicating oneself to death with no regrets."

traits.locale_text: 「死を与え、受け取ること。運命の紆余曲折を恐れないこと。死を恐れる者は、魂の中で既に死んでいる。終わりを待ち、避けられぬことを受け入れることを恐れているのだ。恐怖の人生は不名誉なことだ。真の道とは後悔することなく死へと身を捧げることなのだ」

languages.text: “给予死亡，接受死亡，不要惧怕命运的转折。惧怕死亡之人，灵魂早已死亡，他们等待着终点到来，不敢接受无可避免的事情。在恐惧之中苟活是可耻的行为，只有无怨无悔地献身于死亡，才是真正的侍奉。”
languages.original_text: "To give and receive death. And to fear no twist or turn of fate. One who is afraid of death is already dead in their soul, waiting for the end, afraid to accept the inevitable. A life of fear is disgraceful. The true service is in dedicating oneself to death with no regrets."

traits.locale_text: “给予死亡，接受死亡，不要惧怕命运的转折。惧怕死亡之人，灵魂早已死亡，他们等待着终点到来，不敢接受无可避免的事情。生活在恐惧中是可耻的行为，只有无怨无悔地献身于死亡，才是真正的道路。”

languages.text: « Donner et recevoir la mort, sans craindre les aléas du destin. Qui a peur de la mort est déjà mort en son âme et ne fait plus qu'attendre la fin, sans pour autant avoir le courage d'accepter l'inéluctable. Une vie passée dans la crainte est indigne d'être vécue. Le seul service véritable nous invite à nous dévouer entièrement à la mort, au mépris des regrets. »
languages.original_text: "To give and receive death. And to fear no twist or turn of fate. One who is afraid of death is already dead in their soul, waiting for the end, afraid to accept the inevitable. A life of fear is disgraceful. The true service is in dedicating oneself to death with no regrets."

traits.locale_text: « Donner et recevoir la mort, sans craindre les aléas du destin. Qui a peur de la mort est déjà mort en son âme et ne fait plus qu'attendre la fin, sans pour autant avoir le courage d'accepter l'inéluctable. Une vie passée dans la crainte est indigne d'être vécue. La seule voie véritable nous invite à nous dévouer entièrement à la mort, au mépris des regrets. »

languages.text: "Ölümü dağıtmak ve ölüme kucak açmaktır. Kaderin cilvesinden de feleğin sillesinden de korkmamaktır. Ölümden korkan, ruhunu çoktan ölüme teslim etmiştir. Kaçınılmazı kabul etmeye korkarak nihayeti beklemektedir. Korku dolu bir hayat, rezaletten ibarettir. Hakiki hizmet, kişinin kendini hiçbir pişmanlık duymadan ölüme adamasıdır."
languages.original_text: "To give and receive death. And to fear no twist or turn of fate. One who is afraid of death is already dead in their soul, waiting for the end, afraid to accept the inevitable. A life of fear is disgraceful. The true service is in dedicating oneself to death with no regrets."
